channel.title: how to grow mushrooms on SimpleAgar

item.title: Getting Started - Start Here
item.description: Where do I begin? So you’ve chosen to start growing mushrooms. So, what’s next? So, where do you begin? You attempted to use the search function, but there is so much information. You have no idea what questions to ask, let alone what strategy to use. There’s a lot of contradicting information out there. The Breakdown Mushroom cultivation requires 2 basic things: You need to grow mycelium on a substrate, then get that mycelium to produce mushrooms.
